channel.title: Versatility - Decide your own fate!
channel.description:
[left][font=trebuchet ms][size=36pt]Versatility![/size][/font][/left] Welcome to Versatility, Versatility is a 317 RSPS running 617 items and with perfectly working combat and all skills ready for you to master! We are publicly open and also looking for staff, developers and designers! So come along and enjoy the experience! We are a new Eco / PvP Based server and there are many things about Versatility that makes it enjoyable such as: perfect working combat, all skills ready for you to max out Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, King Black Dragon, Barrelchest, Kalphite Queen, Bank tabs are flawless,Chaos Elemental, Bork, Ice Strykewyrms, Avatar of Creation, Avatar of Destruction, Daily Tasks, Achievement system, Completionest cape + Max Cape, Boss Pets, Perfect Switching including comat, Amazing PvM Drop rate, and it's relativley easy to level, some servers it takes longer to level than to grow a beard as a baby! There's much much more ingame! but the rest is upto you to find! so jump in and explore Versatility! Safe Adventures, Versatility.
- Amazing Combat system - Perfect Eco / Drop rates - Fully working minigames - Amazing staff / players - 24x7
[SIZE=7]Website : [url=http://versatility-rsps.com]Versatility-RS[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=7]Forum : [url=http://versatility-rsps.com/forums]Versatility Forums[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=7]Client [URL=http://"http://versatility-rsps.com/versatility.jar"]versatility.jar[/URL][/SIZE] MORE MEDIA COMING SOON

[left][font=trebuchet ms][size=36pt]Versatility![/size][/font][/left]
Welcome to Versatility, Versatility is a 317 RSPS running 617 items and with perfectly working combat and all skills ready for you to master! We are publicly open and also looking for staff, developers and designers! So come along and enjoy the experience! We are a new Eco / PvP Based server and there are many things about Versatility that makes it enjoyable such as: perfect working combat, all skills ready for you to max out Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, King Black Dragon, Barrelchest, Kalphite Queen, Bank tabs are flawless,Chaos Elemental, Bork, Ice Strykewyrms, Avatar of Creation, Avatar of Destruction, Daily Tasks, Achievement system, Completionest cape + Max Cape, Boss Pets, Perfect Switching including comat, Amazing PvM Drop rate, and it’s relativley easy to level, some servers it takes longer to level than to grow a beard as a baby! There’s much much more ingame! but the rest is upto you to find! so jump in and explore Versatility! Safe Adventures, Versatility.
